title: Keep changes strictly scoped to login/trial gating without impacting existing CRUD/features

requirements.text: Confine any code changes in this iteration to the login flow, pre-login experience, and trial gameplay access gating only; do not modify any other feature behavior or any existing CRUD logic/data flows outside authentication/trial gating.

quotes: Make focused changes only. Ensure no other features or CRUD is impacted.****

acceptanceCriteria: No backend data models, stable storage layout, or CRUD methods are changed except where strictly required for authentication/trial gating.
Authenticated users can still access and use all existing modules/pages with the same create/read/update/delete behavior as before.
Unauthenticated users remain restricted to the pre-login experience and the defined trial game allowlist; attempts to access other pages continue to redirect/block with English messaging.
No new pages/modules/features are introduced as part of this change set.

constraints: Make focused changes only; do not impact any other features or CRUD behavior.
Use English for all user-facing text.
Backend must remain single-actor (backend/main.mo); create backend/migration.mo only if state schema changes are required.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Adding new games, modules, or CRUD endpoints.
Refactoring unrelated UI components or redesigning unrelated pages.
